1183210.name: Through The Unknown
1183210.description:
Through The Unknown is a 3D platformer where you try to survive deadly environments as a little jelly cube. Play through a courageous story mode and unlock new features for the level editor, where you can create your own courses to play.

Features

  • Help Jay accomplish his dream of getting eaten in a narrated Story Mode filled with dangerous obstacles.
  • Collect golden sugar to unlock new features in the game’s Creator Mode.
  • Build your own courses in Creator Mode and challenge your friends to make it through.
1183210.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
